attributes.action: Prevent the ill & elderly dying so VIPS can get to Olympics quicker
attributes.additional_details: Olympic games organizers are banning ambulances from using traffic free lanes on London's roads during the Olympics. London's roads will be 100 times more busy than normal because of the Olympics. The ill & elderly could be dying because they are stuck in traffic while celebrities & VIPS use the special traffic free lanes set up for them. This is a complete JOKE. Londoners put at risk. Allow ambulances to use these Lanes, put peoples health before a ceremony!
